topic.title: Inter-Provider Transfer Administrative Minimum Data Set
topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThis Inter-Provider Transfer Administrative Minimum Data SetÂ specifies the data necessary to permit the receiving Health Care Provider to be able to report the PATIENT's progress along their PATIENT PATHWAY and, in particular, their REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD.
